data.name: Visa Debit Card
data.description: Help separate personal and business finances with a debit card linked to your business transaction account.

features.additionalInfo: Use a debit card linked to your business bank account to deposit and withdraw funds and make payments and purchases.
Use online and overseas wherever Visa is accepted
No operator fees at St. George, BankSA, Bank of Melbourne and Westpac ATMs.
Order up to 8 cards, to give employees access to these eligible accounts : Freedom Business Account, Business Cheque Account Plus, and Commercial Overdraft.
The product includes limited range of FRAUD_PROTECTION features.

Take advantage of the following Visa services : Visa Secure - provides an online guarantee so you can shop with confidence and Visa Offers + Perks  - for benefits on concerts, cinema, sporting events, travel and more.

Explore ShopBack offers and earn bonus Cashback when you shop via the St. George Lounge on ShopBack. Want tickets to The Olympic Games Paris 2024? Dive into The Olympic Games Paris 2024, thanks to Visa when you shop on the St.George Lounge on ShopBack. Competition ends 16th May 2024. Terms & Conditions apply.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Account holder, signatory, or nominated by the account holder to receive a card
Operating in Australia with an Australian address
Needs an eligible business account in the name of the account holder, to link the card

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: 3% of the Australian dollar value for transactions with merchants based overseas.

fees.name: Transaction Fees
fees.additionalInfo: No additional transaction fees for Visa Debit card purchases
